chunk_id: Integrated Maternal and Perinatal Care Guideline_23_10_2024_0__chunk_781
source: Integrated Maternal and Perinatal Care Guideline_23_10_2024_0
text:
fer.
o An ambulance, preferably with a paramedic, should aim to arrive to collect the patient withing 30 minutes.
 If no paramedic is available and staffing allows, a doctor or midwife (when available) can
accompany the patient.
o A senior doctor at the referral hospital must have been contacted to inform them of the referral and to
provide further advice before transfer.
o All medical and surgical treatment available at the referring facility must have been performed.
 Uterine balloon tampona
